replies.message: I swear no one has won a single holiday and this has been going on for months. Not one single update, there should be thousands or at least hundreds of people winning a holiday considering its more or less world wide...but yet nothing! 🤔🤥
And I would like to see who won a trip by codes when and for which destination...Fair play!

Hi Mila, thanks for getting in touch. We've had a winner for each day the promotion has been open so far. All winners will be contacted within 24 hours via email, to the email address they provided at the point of entry. Hope this helps :)

Hi Széles, thanks for getting in touch. Unfortunately we're unable to publish the winners online, however a winners list can be requested in writing. For more info please visit: http://spr.ly/61818oDd7
